name: Kaien
description:
Kaien's a game character that's very near and dear to me.

He's a game character I've been mulling over since I was a teenager. I wanted more people in games that looked like me, and as I wrote his story I added a lot of the experiences I felt in life. Lots of stuff happens to Kaien, Valorem, Yami, Aqlos and all of them, but if I make this game, it better be A SIGHT TO SEE. That time's not now so I can't. If I start trying to add a story to this I'll have to take the project super seriously XD
